group_1.textLeft: Why am I in Kamihama City?

group_1.textRight: Kamihama City?@Do you know this town, Madoka?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Homura, you've been here before@many times, right?

group_1.textRight: No, I don't know a town like this.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure you've been here many times@with me...

group_1.textRight: (I have conflicting memories.)
(I wonder if this Madoka is from another@timeline.)

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it, the scenery seems kind@of fuzzy.
Can you see the blur in the distance?
It's as if we're living in a dream!

group_1.textRight: A dream...@So you feel the same way, Madoka?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Homura, you too?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I was sleeping, but when I woke up,@I found myself here.
And it's...it's as though a haze has settled over@my memory.
I can't recall the details of what I was doing@before then.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe I am in a dream too, but...
I wonder if it's possible for both of us to share@the same dream?

group_1.textRight: Something is strange, so perhaps.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
Amy?!
It IS Amy, after all!

group_1.textRight: (Amy... Madoka's beloved cat.)
(But why is she in this town?)

group_1.textLeft: Oh, wait up!

group_1.textRight: Madoka?

group_1.textLeft: Hah...hah...

group_1.textRight: Meow![wait:0.5][se:7101_catvoice]
Madoka, it's dangerous to proceed recklessly.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, but...
She's pausing sometimes, as if waiting to lead@us forward.
It seemed like she was trying to guide us here...
Oh...
What's that by Amy's side?

group_1.textRight: Dice and fortunes, I guess.@There seem to be two of them.

group_1.textLeft: There's something written on them.

group_1.narration: [textRed:Good Luck]@Isn't it beautiful to share a close bond...?@Let's aim for the board game's goal together!

group_1.textLeft: "Good luck"...?
What does it mean by "the board game's goal"?
Let's see what's written on the other one.

group_1.textRight: ...I'll read this one.

group_1.narration: [textRed:Terrible Luck]@Turn misfortune into blessings...@The goal is within the grounds of Mizuna Shrine.

group_1.textRight: This one is terrible luck.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Perhaps it's a hint of things to come.
Maybe it means we should head to the@Mizuna Shrine together?
Will we wake up from this dream once we reach@the board game's goal?

group_1.textRight: Meow!

group_1.textLeft: Hehehe, Amy seems to agree.

group_1.textRight: Aim for the board game's goal...

group_1.textLeft: Homura, is something on your mind?

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, perhaps.
This place might be a Witch's Labyrinth.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...I see...@That is a possibility.
I'll try sensing for magic!
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2][se:7211_souljem_02]...@...
There doesn't seem to be any sign of a Witch.

group_1.textRight: (Madoka is a Magical Girl?)

group_1.textLeft: But it's certainly a strange dream.@Homura, what do you think?

group_1.textRight: I think magic is definitely involved.
It isn't normal for us to share the same dream.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's the magic of a Magical Girl...@Or maybe it's attributed to a [textBlue:Rumor]?

group_1.textRight: [textBlue:Rumor]...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, a mysterious phenomenon related to magic@that occasionally occurs in Kamihama City.

group_1.textRight: Then perhaps we've fallen into that kind of trap.

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's not exactly a trap, it's more like...
Sometimes coincidences pile up and lead to@disturbances like this.

group_1.textRight: You make it sound like it happens all the time.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we've experienced it a few times, but we@managed to resolve things in the end.

group_1.textRight: (I'm not entirely sure what Madoka means@by a [textBlue:Rumor].)
(It's certainly possible that the magic of a@Magical Girl is involved.)
If this is a Witch's Labyrinth, then defeating the@Witch should enable us to escape.
But we can't do that if we're unable to locate@our adversary.

group_1.textLeft: I understand...

group_1.textRight: Though the situation is quite mysterious,@it seems we only have one option for now.
We must aim for the goal.
